citeCollection.label: Label
citeCollection.dc:title: Homer Multitext project, Marciana 841 pages
citeCollection.dc:creator: Christopher Blackwell
Neel Smith
citeCollection.dc:coverage: All folio sides of the Marciana 841 manuscript.
citeCollection.dc:description: An ordered collection of pages (folio sides) of the Marciana 841 manuscript. The CodexUrn property can be used to merge this Collection with the HMT Codices Collection.
citeCollection.dc:rights: All data in this collection are available under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution-Non-Commercial 3.0 Unported License, http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/deed.en_US
